profile_positions.title: Medical student

profile_positions.description: The studies International Business and Economics and Business Economics are programmes that use 100% decentralised selection. My function at the Admissions Office at the School of Business and Economics was to make sure the applicant handed in a complete file.
profile_positions.title: Student assistant

profile_positions.description: PhD thesis ''Endovascular abdominal aortic aneurysm repair: evaluation of outcomes and risks of postoperative surveillance'' defended on February 11, 2022. Supervision: professor Balm, dr. Koelemay and dr. Vahl (OLVG).
profile_positions.title: PhD Candidate Surgery

profile_positions.description: AMR (AMC Medical Research BV) is een dochteronderneming van het AMC en ondersteunt opdrachtgevers, projectleiders en medewerkers bij het uitvoeren van onderzoek binnen het Amsterdam UMC (locatie AMC). De OR-AMR helpt bij het adviseren en meebeslissen over arbeidsvoorwaarden, arbo-zaken, pensioen, reorganisatie/alliantie, veiligheid en loopbaanontwikkeling van AMR-medewerkers.
profile_positions.title: Lid Ondernemingsraad AMR (AMC Medical Research BV)

profile_positions.description: Internship of choice at the Department of Surgery for a period of 10 weeks (6 week Vascular Surgery and 4 weeks Pediatric Surgery)
profile_positions.title: Internship Surgery

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the organization of the Medical Business Masterclass 2018. An evening masterclass at multiple locations for young doctors aiming to extend and broaden knowledge on financial, managerial and business aspects of healthcare. 
For more information please, please visit: http://www.medicalbusiness.nl/masterclass/over-mbm/
profile_positions.title: Committee Member Medical Business Masterclass

profile_positions.description: Het optimaliseren van de pre-operatieve screeningspoli van de Anesthesiologie in het MUMC+. Aandachtspunten zijn hierbij de efficiëntie (gebruik van menskracht en materiaal, doorlooptijd van patiënten, betere en snellere triage), betere en specifiekere informatievoorziening naar de patiënten en decision support voor het medisch personeel.
profile_positions.title: Lid Medical Business Projects

profile_positions.description:
Clinical research internship at the Sarwal Lab which is part of the Department of Surgery led by professor Minnie Sarwal. The lab is dedicated to understanding the mechanisms of injury in organ failure, with particular emphasis on acute and chronic kidney disease, and injury in organ transplantation.

http://sarwallab.surgery.ucsf.edu/lab-members.aspx
profile_positions.title: Visiting Research Scholar at Division of Transplant Surgery

profile_positions.description: During one year I was the head member of the board of O.D.M. Hesperides, a sorority in Maastricht. During this period I was responsible for the welfare of the sorority and act as a contact for both internal and external. Chairing all meetings and ensure that all key issues are discussed.
profile_positions.title: President
